channel.title: Projects on Jake Learns Data Science
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Jake Learns Data Science

item.title: Twitter Analysis - R Shiny App
item.description: I created a Shiny app that searches Twitter and does some simple analysis.

item.title: How Data Science Is Keeping Your Cell Phone Info Safe
item.description: I am honored to have been interviewed by Philly Magazine about how my experience from Villanova’s Masters in Applied Statistics has influenced my work in analytics at Comcast!

item.title: Jake Learns Data Science Visitor Dashboard
item.description: A quick view of visitors to my website. Data pulled from Google Analytics and pushed to Amazon Redshift using Stitch Data.

item.title: GAP RE-MINDER
item.description: A demonstration D3 project, shamelessly ripping off Gapminder.
